history.narrative: Law 4-61 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-264, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 15, 1981 and September 29, 1981, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 30, 1981, it was assigned Act No. 4-107 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
